text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump I thought you weren’t going to lie to the American people. Sad. You work for the merchant of death. +70,000 Americans dead from COVID-19 and the number keeps rising. The virus isn’t contained. How many people are going to die because of you? #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath
